entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of rain. Temperature steady near plus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 over exposed coastal sections. Temperature steady near plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Rain. Temperature steady near 6.
entry.summary: Rain. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 except 80 gusting to 100 over exposed coastal sections in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 50 gusting to 70 late in the morning then becoming southeast 50 gusting to 70 late in the afternoon. Temperature steady near 6. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain. Temperature steady near plus 4.
entry.summary: Rain. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 except southeast 50 gusting to 70 over exposed coastal sections early in the evening. Wind becoming light overnight. Temperature steady near plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Saturday 8 April 2023
